sentences.sContent: He replied with characteristic insouciance: "So what?"
sentences.sCn: 他用特有的漫不经心的口吻答道：“那又怎么样？”

synos.tran: 无忧无虑；漫不经心；满不在乎

remMethod.val: in(不) + souc(担心) + iance → 不担心 → 漠不关心

words.tran: 漫不经心的，漠不关心的；无忧无虑的

trans.tranCn: 漠不关心， 漫不经心
trans.tranOther: Insouciance is lack of concern shown by someone about something that they are expected to take more seriously
